short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Claim your GT7 Sport profile automatically with this extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Use this extension to automatically connect your DG Edge user to your GT7 player profile in order to access profile editing and access more features like setups uploading and more
